job.title: Machine Learning Engineer: Full Time Opportunities for Students and Recent Graduates
job.description: Redfin is combining technology and customer service to reinvent the endtoend experience for buying and selling a home in the consumers favor We are a missiondriven company helping people across North America buy and sell homes saving them hundreds of millions of dollars in fees and doing it all with a high customer satisfaction score With over 75 billion spent every year on real estate commissions the opportunity is huge and the industry is ripe for changebrbrThe Applied Machine Learning AML group at Redfin works towards redefining real estate in the customers favor using machine learning We work on foundational problems in the real estate space including Recommendations Where should I live and Price estimation How much is a home worth We have real estate data at a national level and work across various domains in machine learning using largescale multimodal property data documents images text video 3d scans etc AML also owns and maintains endtoend productiongrade largescale machine learning infrastructure and systems serving hundreds of millions of consumersbrbrAs a Machine Learning Engineer for the Applied Machine Learning Team your job is to solve foundational problems in the real estate space using our massive store of market and user data and Machine Learning You will have the opportunity to design prototype and develop customerfacing data products for millions of users 100 millions of properties and thousands of agents You will work with an experienced group of machine learning engineers and researchers with robust research to production culturebrbrstronguYou Should Havebrustrongulli Pursuing a degree in computer science CS mathematics statistics or a related field within 6 months from graduation or graduated within the last 24 months lili Experience with Python amp SQL and Machine Learning amp Big Data technologies such as Spark Scikitlearn pandas etc lili Knowledge of CS fundamentals algorithms and data structures lili Knowledge of deep learning frameworks such as Pytorch TensorFlow etc and deep learning architectures RNNs CNNs Transformers etc is a bonus lili Experience dealing with unstructured data text image video documents is a bonus lili An entrepreneurial spirit and a strong empathy for the customer experience lili Strong written and verbal communication skills brliulstronguWe Offerbrustrongulli An opportunity to be part of a dynamic growing company where your contributions make a real difference and new ideas are always welcome lili Amazingly smart and fun teammates to collaborate with and learn from lili A competitive compensation package with generous benefits lili A sweet office near South Lake Union with fun perks like free catered lunches brliulstrong Redfin is an equal opportunity employer brbrstrongTo ensure the health and safety of our workforce customers and third parties Redfin conducts background screening after making conditional offers for employment All screening is conducted consistent with Equal Employment Opportunity Commission guidance and state and local Fair Chance Act guidance and Redfin encourages applications from and fully considers qualified applicants with criminal record histories
